name: First Person Tennis - The Real Tennis Simulator
abstract: Play on a real tennis court and face professional tennis players. Show all your technical and tactical skills to climb the ranking.

detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, German, Japanese, French, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, Russian
detail.app_release_note:
• New customizable training session with buttons to place cones with different colors and floating targets.
• Buttons to save the position of the objects in 3 different save slots.
• Wall Training.
• Trajectory line.
• New customizable Drone as ball machine, possibility to modify the sequence and the values of each shot.
• New calibration system, possibility to save the custom grip in 3 different save slots.
• Improved anticheat system.
• Pause menu is dynamic now.
• New Movement deadzone option to disable teleport/autorun in your play space.
• Run button disables joystick run too.
• Improved light and performance of the indoor court.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4 Pro
